node.text: ⚠️AMAZING KITTEN RESCUE!⚠️ During our recent trip to Greece, our friends @everchanginghorizon and @jess.wandering rescued the cutest little kitten that was abandoned on a cliffside and we were honored to also help after getting introduced to @zawf.zante.gr an incredible animal rescue charity that desperately needed more funding to help save more animals! Karmagawa cofounder @timothysykes donated 1,000 euros to them on the spot, but we have also created a fundraiser with the goal of raising $25,000 to get them a full on shelter and veterinarian on their staff because there are SO many more animals in Zakynthos that need URGENT help so please donate what you can, share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too and let’s all work together to raise the $25k ZAWF needs to help more animals in need! Sadly, this little kitten didn’t make it and that’s why we MUST get these poor animals more help faster in the future…we’ll link our @karmagawa Facebook fundraiser in our stories/highlights too and ALL donations on all platforms, great and small, are most appreciated! #helpanimals #savethekitties #zakynthos #animalrescue #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️HOW GREAT IS THIS ANIMAL RESCUE?!⚠️ Leo found this squirrel having a seizure while he was helping his mom in the garden and he quickly decided to help this poor creature in need. Even though the squirrel was unresponsive at first, Leo still wanted to help and as you watch this video, see how he and his sister successfully nursed this poor squirrel back to full health! How great is this?! Please share this heartwarming video with your followers and tag people who need some positivity in their day and let’s all thank Leo and his sister for their amazing animal rescue here as we should all get inspired to help animals in need! Great video @ladbible #saveanimals #animalrescue #helpanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES: PLEASE SHARE THIS AND SIGN THE PETITION TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW! ⚠️ Do you know the dark truth behind the cosmetic industry and the beauty products far too many unaware people use? How beautiful can someone feel if they knew that their beauty products caused unimaginable pain and torture to innocent animals?⁣⁠ The testing of baby pigs, beagles, rabbits, monkeys, rats and mice reveals deliberate cruelty…rabbits dying, monkeys screaming and dogs suffering accompanied by staff jokes as they are injected or forced to ingest or inhale substances to measure toxic effects, which can include vomiting, internal bleeding, respiratory problems, fever, organ failure and even death.⁠ This happens worldwide and spreading awareness is the key to stopping it so please share this sad post with your followers and tag people who need to see this. There’s also a petition in the @karmagawa highlights to close Vivotecnia Laboratory, one of the worst offenders...THIS MUST STOP NOW! Please share this video with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see this too and sign the petition we’ve linked in our highlights as sadly more than 115 million animals suffer and die every year in laboratories like these — WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE RIGHT NOW!  Use your social media platform and share to speak up for these innocent animals that are being tortured! Eye-opening video by @thesavemovement  #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #endanimaltesting #stopanimaltesting #animalsdeservebetter #karmagawa

node.title: The Dark Truth Behind The Cosmetic Industry

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE THIS AMAZING VIDEO AND LET’S REMIND EVERYONE TO HELP ANIMALS IN NEED! ⚠️ This rescued baby chimp fell asleep in the lap of the pilot @anthonycaere while they flew to his new home…how cute is this?! Amazing work Anthony and @lwiro_primates stop, ok ease help us get the word out about this incredible story and these people who work hard to protect these beautiful animals by sharing this post and tagging people who need to see it as we MUST make this a better planet for humans and animals alike and spreading awareness is the key! Great video by @thedodo #animalrescue #savethebabies #animalsdeservebetter #stopthekilling #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING: PLEASE SHARE TO HELP STOP THIS REVOLTING ANIMAL CRUELTY! ⚠️ This is who really suffers for the exotic skins trade. This footage exposes how workers are trained to kill and skin crocodiles—all for “fashion” and WE MUST EACH DO OUR PART TO STOP THIS MADNESS RIGHT NOW! The fact that people still buy clothing and accessories made from animal skin like this is due to a lack of awareness of how terribly these animals are treated so please use your social media platform and share this URGENT video with your followers to help us educate everyone as WE MUST STOP THIS ANIMAL ABUSE ONCE AND FOR ALL! There’s plenty of other non-cruel materials that can be used to make clothing and accessories, especially sustainable/recycled fabrics like our own Karmagawa & @savethereef charity march (see link in our bio)…WE MUST GET THE FASHION INDUSTRY TO STOP ABUSING/ELECTROCUTING INNOCENT ANIMALS! Please share this sad video and tag people, celebrities, influencers & news media who need to see and share this too…no animal deserves to to be treated like this! Thanks for posting @peta #savethecrocodiles #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.title: Why You Shouldn’t Buy Crocodile Skin Clothing/Accessories

node.text: ⚠️HOW AMAZING IS THIS ACT OF HUMAN KINDNESS?⚠️This cow had fallen down a slope and into the fast-moving water and would have drowned had it not been saved by several brave locals here. Please watch and share this incredible animal rescue video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so they can share too & let’s all spread awareness about this important message of how we should ALL help animals in need like these kind people did for this cow that was nearly swept away by this canal! #teamwork #animalrescue #helpanimals #saveanimals #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE THIS WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS!⚠️12 years ago, the abuse of sloth bears was being sold to tourists as ‘entertainment’ in the streets of India. These ‘dancing bears’ were in constant agony as they pleased their ‘owners’ for the enjoyment of passers-by. With a rope threaded through a raw wound of their muzzle, they were pulled around to stand on their hind legs and shake in pain, giving the illusion of a ‘dance’. The bear in this video is named Raju, India's very last dancing bear. Thanks to @international_animal_rescue @wildlifesos and @freethebears more than 600 bears, including Raju were rescued and given a permanent home at one of the sanctuaries throughout India! The direct action of rescuing these bears was of course necessary in ending this 400+ year old tradition, but working with the bear handlers (known as the Kalandar people) with education and outreach programs was also vital as the Kalandar people who relied on the practice to feed their families were treated with dignity and were provided with alternate livelihoods through training schemes and grants. Many have now gone on to open their own businesses while others now work at the rescue centers. And for the first time Kalandar children were able to attend school and receive education sponsored by the project, in fact over 1000 children have now benefitted from this program. Please share this sad but ultimately uplifting post with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers as together, we can all make a difference to the lives of suffering animals everywhere! Great video by @international_animal_rescue #animalrescue #savethebears #endanimalcruelty #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️WARNING: GRAPHIC IMAGES, PLEASE SHARE TO HELP SAVE SHARKS!⚠️ Back in 2019, the Karmagawa crew traveled to South Africa with the extremely talented underwater photographers @andremusgrove and @jeff_panella and our partners at @representclo to bring greater awareness to the sharks of South Africa since these apex predators are being killed far too often and that’s de-stabilizing our planet’s marine ecosystem. For this @savethereef project we worked with the great charity @sharkconservancy and the awesome crew at @shark_explorers and we are proud to also support marine life charities like @sharkguardian in their important shark research and conservation efforts. Please watch and share this urgent video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see it so we can make EVERYONE aware of how urgent this crisis has become as we MUST stop killing sharks and destroying the future of our oceans before it’s too late! #SouthAfrica #savethesharks #sharksarefriends #savethereef #karmagawa

node.title: Why We MUST Save Sharks Before It’s Too Late!

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS TO STOP THIS MADNESS RIGHT NOW!⚠️ Have you wondered how microplastic could ever end up in the meat that millions of people consume? Here is your proof! This is the ugly reality of the meat industry that they don't want people to know about, and though it might seem hard to believe, what is being displayed in this video is a legally defined animal feed ingredient: “Recovered Retail Food“. The FDA openly allows livestock animals to be fed expired/spoiled bakery goods, eggs, and dairy products, but “it must not contain packaging materials”. This video clearly shows otherwise so, why hasn’t FDA or state regulatory authorities stepped in to decisively stop the use of plastic in livestock feed ingredients? Sadly, regulators are fully aware that expired grocery foods are collected in their packaging and that there’s a risk that some ingredient manufacturers are not removing plastic packaging, but they just aren’t doing anything about it…SO WE MUST ALL SPEAK UP AND DEMAND CHANGE! Please use your social media platform for good and share this shocking video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share this too, let’s all work together to get regulators to actually enforce the important laws designed to protect people, and animals, from ingesting these harmful plastics! Thank you for exposing this important issue @gmfmusikgroup @get.waste.ed #stopplastic #plasticpollution #endplasticpollution #microplastics #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️HOW GREAT IS THIS ANIMAL RESCUE?⚠️ A poor baby deer had fallen into a canal in North Ogden, Utah and sadly the little angel was fighting for his life, scared and exhausted...and as much as he tried, he couldn't get out by himself. But luckily for him, a kind passerby saw him struggling and immediately approached to help. At last second just before the most dangerous section of the canal with the choppiest waters, this Good Samaritan quickly took him out, saving him from a certain death just in the nick of time…because every life is precious! A better world IS possible and starts with each of us because as poet John Bunyan said, “you have not lived today until you have done something for someone who can never repay you.” Please help us remind everyone to help each other more and share this beautiful video with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media who need to see and share it too and TOGETHER let’s make this a kinder world for humans and animals alike! Thank you @jim_abernethy @emmateu for posting this! #everylifeisprecious #respect #kindness #compassion #hero #animalrescue #karmagawa

⚠️PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS TO STOP THIS ANIMAL CRUELTY!⚠️ Repost from @savethereef This video was taken on Sept 4th, as activists entered MarineLand and observed Kiska, their last surviving orca repeatedly bashing her head against the wall. The activists went inside the marine park and droned to bring awareness to her plight as she was snatched from the wild at age 3 and now she’s over 40 years old…decades of imprisonment! Her life is pure pain, trapped in a cement tank 24 hours a day and she remains the only captive orca in the world to reside in entire social isolation. All of her tank mates have died, including her 5 calves. She has now been alone for 10+ YEARS…THIS IS NOT ENTERTAINMENT, THIS IS TORTURE! Visiting marine parks like this funds animal suffering so it’s important we make everyone aware as these highly intelligent and social creatures are taken from their families and continuously beaten, starved and tortured, their spirits completely broken, until they perform for unaware crowds. WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS! Please use your social media platform to share this post and make EVERYONE aware so they don’t buy a ticket and support cruel places like this, share this post with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers news media who need to see and share this too as no animal deserves lifelong imprisonment like this! Thanks to @breakingmarineland @oceanic.elizabeth @jennyveganmcqueen @peaceful.peter @walrus_whisperer for spreading Kiska’s sad story, let’s help her and ALL OTHER ANIMALS IN CAPITVITY TOO! #FreeKiska #emptythetanks #dontbuyaticket #endanimalcruelty #orcas #stopanimalcruelty #karmagawa #savethereef

node.text: ⚠️PLEASE SHARE WITH YOUR FOLLOWERS TO STOP THIS ANIMAL CRUELTY!⚠️ Mocking and laughing at an innocent animal who’s in prison for life despite having done nothing wrong IS NOT OKAY! These poor animals are taken from their families out in the wild at a young age and then forced to spend the rest of their lives locked up, serving as entertainment for unaware tourists taking selfies. The fact that people still support and pay to visit these cruel places is tragic and it’s due to a lack of awareness so please use your social media platform for good and share this post with your followers to educate everyone as to why it’s SO cruel for these poor animals! WILD ANIMALS DO NOT DESERVE TO BE LOCKED UP FOR TOURISTS TO GAWK AT FOR THEIR ENTIRE LIVES…WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS ANIMAL CRUELTY! Entertain your families in ways that does not inflict harm on others — teach them about we must respect and have compassion for all animals…not to be taken away from their families and out of the wild where they belong! Please share this sad video and tag people, celebrities, influencers news media who need to see and share this too, no animal deserves a lifetime of being locked up like this! #stopanimalcruelty #endanimalcruelty #animalsdeservebetter #wildanimals #wildandfree #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GOOD BREAKING NEWS FOR ONCE, PLEASE SHARE!⚠️ For the first time in history, Indonesian dog meat traders will be prosecuted after illegally transporting 78 dogs bound for slaughter. Police were able to intercept the trader’s truck, as pictured here and as we posted about back in May, after they illegally crossed provincial borders with no record of the dogs’ disease or vaccination status. As proud supporters of the Dog Meat Free Indonesia campaign, we commend the Kulon Progo District Police for taking direct action in what now is a major turning point in the demise of Indonesia’s brutal dog meat trade. Please share this good news with your followers and tag people, celebrities, influencers and news media and get them to help spread awareness too so we can all join together and call on all other local and international governments to follow the lead of this case that demonstrates the illegality of the dog meat trade and the need for ACTION to ban the dog meat trade worldwide…ANIMALS DESERVE BETTER THAN THIS SO WE MUST WORK TOGETHER TO STOP THIS ANIMAL CRUELTY ONCE AND FOR ALL! #endanimalcruelty #animalsdeservebetter #dogsdeservebetter #stopanimalcruelty #stopdogmeat #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SCARY VIDEO: PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US REMIND EVERYONE TO BE EXTRA CAREFUL RIGHT NOW!⚠️ This shocking video shows a person walking through ankle-deep floodwater in their family’s basement in New Jersey when the entire wall caves in and water crashes into the space — fortunately nobody was seriously injured. Others weren’t so lucky as 11 people have now been found dead in basements after torrential rains flooded New York this week as the remnants of Hurricane Ida left a trail of destruction, causing at least 49 deaths in the Northeast alone. Overall, there have now been at least 63 deaths across 8 U.S. states that were hit hard by Ida. Join us in praying for the safety of everyone in these communities and share this with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see/share this too as we must remind EVERYONE to be extra careful right now because as this video proves, water damaged buildings can be VERY dangerous! Video from @abcworldnewstonight #flashflood #ida #hurricaneida #flooding #staysafe #karmagawa

⚠️CRAZY WEATHER: PLEASE SHARE AND HELP US REMIND PEOPLE TO STAY SAFE/TAKE THIS SERIOUSLY!⚠️ At least 21 people have been killed, including a family of three with a two-year-old boy who drowned in a New York City basement, with hundreds missing as the remnants of Hurricane Ida battered Maryland, New York, and New Jersey with tornadoes, record rain and flooding that left these areas under states of emergency on Thursday. More people have now been found dead in New York City from Ida than in Louisiana, which had days to prepare for the storm. Videos show cars submerged on highways and water pouring into subway stations and homes after a wind-driven downpour shattered rainfall records and prompted an unprecedented flash flood emergency for New York City. The rainfall in Central Park was a 1-in-500 year rainfall event, according to National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) rainfall frequency data, with 5.2 inches falling in only 3 hours. The recent record-breaking fires in western US states/Canada were virtually impossible without climate change, which were made worse due to the heat and drought conditions and now this current heavy rainfall is likely a consequence too. Please join us in praying for the safety of everyone affected and also share this sad news with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see and share this too as we must remind everyone to stay safe, take these emergency warnings seriously and treat our planet better before it’s too late! #flashflood #flooding #tornado #staysafe #karmagawa

⚠️SAD BUT HOPEFUL BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND JOIN US IN PRAYING FOR LAKE TAHOE!⚠️ Firefighters have been able to make some headway against the Caldor Fire around South Lake Tahoe, and the popular  town for tourists might be spared from flames, if conditions remain favorable, so let’s all pray for more good news in the coming days!  Today the fire was up in the mountains, away from the main portion of the town, "which is a very good thing," Dave Lauchner, a spokesman for Cal Fire Team 6 told reporters. So far more than 200,000 acres have burned, 50,000 people have been evacuated, and a red flag warning that remains in effect for a swath of eastern California as this fire is only 20% contained. The fire is rapidly expanding because of weather conditions that include low humidity, hot temperatures, and winds so please share this post to help us thank the 4,000+ brave firefighters and 1,000 National Guard members who are battling this fire and join in praying for all the communities in its path! #wildfire #caldorfire #firefighters #laketahoe #prayforlaketahoe #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️GRAPHIC WARNING: PLEASE SHARE AND DONATE TO OUR NEW FUNDRAISER TO HELP THE AFGHAN PEOPLE RIGHT NOW!⚠️ The LGBT+ Afghan community is under threat of extermination for who they are and we MUST help them in their time of need RIGHT NOW! Swipe through these horrifying news headlines coming out daily to see why we’ve added 2 new charities as part of our Karmagawa fundraiser to help those fleeing the cruel Taliban who are now in charge — we’ll be donating 100% of funds raised now to @teamrubicon and @rainbowrailroad in addition to @partnersrelief and @savethechildren because while international governments have pulled out, there are still many people there who are in desperate need of help or else they will be killed in truly barbaric ways. Now with the Taliban in power, the official punishment for homosexuality under sharia law is either death by stoning or “wall-toppling” – being buried under rubble. The Taliban have promised to “weed out and exterminate” Afghanistan’s LGBT+ community, with a Taliban judge recently saying “they can either await a slow death or a quick one.” THIS IS JUST WRONG SO WE MUST HELP THESE PEOPLE! Please speak up and use your social platform for good by sharing this important post with your followers and tagging people, celebrities, influencers and news media that need too see and share this too and also donate to our fundraiser! We want to help save as many Afghan people as possible so please join in helping us spread awareness about this URGENT ISSUE RIGHT NOW! #helpafghanistan #lgbtq🌈 #saveafghanistan #lgbt #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️SAD BREAKING NEWS, PLEASE SHARE AND JOIN US IN PRAYING FOR LOUISIANA!⚠️ Hurricane Ida is causing devastation and power outages in Louisiana after its Category 4 landfall with life-threatening storm surge, catastrophic winds and dangerous rainfall flooding. Ida has tied two other hurricanes for the strongest landfall on record in the state of Louisiana based on maximum wind speeds as Laura had 150-mph winds when it tracked into southwest Louisiana last year and the only other hurricane with winds that high was all the way back in 1856. So far, more than 400,000 customers without power in Louisiana and Energy Louisiana said some of its customers could be without power for weeks. "Everyone should listen to the instructions from local and state officials just how dangerous this is, and take it seriously. It's not just the coast, it's not just New Orleans, it's north as well," President Joe Biden said Sunday at the Federal Emergency Management Agency headquarters in Washington, DC. Please join us in praying for all those in the path of this dangerous hurricane and share this post/tag people who need to see it because we must warn EVERYONE to stay safe and take this storm seriously as Louisiana needs all our support and prayers right now! #prayforlouisiana #hurricane #staysafeeveryone #ida #louisiana #hurricaneida #karmagawa

node.text: ⚠️WHAT DO YOU THINK OF THIS?!?!⚠️ Groom Expo West, "the West Coast's most illustrious grooming show," recently took place in Pasadena, California and as Vogue Magazine says events like this are “fraught with ethical questions inherent to their subject matter.” We believe animals deserve better and should not be used for entertainment like this, but let’s see what you think of these dogs having their fur dyed along with added hair extensions and accessories in order to win prizes. Comment below with your thoughts, tag people who also need to see this, vote in the poll in our stories and also share this post with your followers! #dogshow #animalsdeservebetter #stopthis #dogsofinstagram #karmagawa

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Karmagawa on August 27, 2021. May be an image of 2 people, people standing, outdoors and text that says 'US special operations vets carry out daring mission to save Afghan allies'.

node.text: ⚠️AMAZING BREAKING NEWS FOR ONCE, PLEASE SHARE THIS AND LET’S GIVE THANKS TO THESE HEROES!⚠️ A group of US war veterans launched a highly dangerous but ultimately successful mission the past 72 hours to save hundreds of at-risk Afghan allies and their families. Members of the volunteer group, called the “Pineapple Express” saved as many as 630 “high-risk Afghan individuals, families with small children, orphans, and pregnant women”, by smuggling them into Kabul’s airport under cover of night, and handed over to the protective custody of the U.S. military. The group, made up of current and former U.S. special operators, aid workers, intelligence officers and others, had banded together to bring as many Afghan allies to safety as they could, working unofficially with the United States military and U.S. embassy. The risky effort was observed by ABC News under the agreement of secrecy while the heart-pounding movements unfolded and was still underway when suicide bombers attacked the airport on Thursday and some of Pineapple Express’ passengers were sadly wounded in the bomb blast. The rescue comprised of a slow and steady system of maneuvering the Afghan families in the darkness and was modeled after Harriet Tubman’s Underground Railroad for American slave escapees. Please share this great news with your followers and tag people, celebrities and influencers who need to see/share this too as we must show everyone how there are still good people out there willing to risk their lives to save others! #heroes #prayforkabul #prayforafghanistan #helpkabul #afghantaliban #karmagawa
